verbose_text: Investigation of the Mtr pathway not only has advanced our understanding of molecular mechanisms by which microbial cells transfer electrons to the external environment, such as for the reduction of Fe (III) minerals, but also will enable improved applications of S. oneidensis MR-1 and other metal reducing Shewanella in microbial fuel cells and for electrobiosynthesis of valuable bio-materials.
evidence: Mtr pathway not only has advanced our understanding of molecular mechanisms by which microbial cells transfer electrons to the external environment, such as for the reduction of Fe(III) minerals, but also will enable improved applications of S. oneidensis MR-1
